info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 07 at 5:57PM EDT until April 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON...NORTHWESTERN HERTFORD...NORTHWESTERN GATES...AND SOUTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murfreesboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Winton and Cofield around 605 PM EDT. Gatesville, Gates and Roduco around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Milwaukee, Tunis, Menola, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Buckland, Dort, Sunbeam and George. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
